page.title: 05LLOYDS BANK
page.content: The sub_manager of Lloyds bank who we interviewed was called Mike Lee. He had worked at Lloyds bank for 6 years He was unable to tell us how much money that the bank had in its vaults for security reasons. There were 28 people working there, only 9 of which were men. The staff work in shifts from 9.30am_3.30pm. He said that the busiest day of the week was Friday and the busiest time of year was Christmas and the end of the year. He said that the minimum age for a worker there was 16. Cars, Home Improvements and weddings are the things Personal Loans are used for most. The bank has been raided 2 times and there are security alarms, but he couldn't tell us any more than that.
